Comments_List: Wide variety of topics including atmospheric chemistry, air quality impacts related to energy, etc. All of it was very up-to-date with current research.
Air quality, particle lifetimes, atmospheric chemistry
Well-organized, taught effectively, interesting and relevant topics. Journal club was interesting and doing a couple more might have been nice.
Definitely; the class offers useful, interesting skills and information that are applicable across many fields. Also generally enjoyable and engaging.
Yes, it was engaging and informative.
